title: Ed Hochuli
summary: Edward G. Hochuli[1] (/ˈhɒkjʊli/; born December 25, 1950)[2] is an American attorney and retired American football official. He has served as an attorney at Jones, Skelton & Hochuli, P.L.C. since 1983, and was an official in the National Football League (NFL) from 1990 to 2017; his uniform number was 85. Prior to his officiating career, he played college football for four seasons at the University of Texas at El Paso (UTEP).
